text: Film Songs is an EP by American singer-songwriter Stan Ridgway. It was released on January 20, 1996 by TWA Records and comprises songs Ridgway composed for various films and two live performance tracks. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Adapted from the Film Songs liner notes. ;Musicians *Joseph Berardi – drums, percussion *Stan Ridgway – lead vocals, acoustic guitar, harmonica, production (1-6) *Mark Schulz – electric guitar, backing vocals *David Sutton – electric bass, acoustic bass, backing vocals *Pietra Wexstun – keyboards, backing vocals ;Production and additional personnel *Mitchell Froom – production (7) *John Gillingham – recording (6, 7) *Shelley Roye – cover art, design *Doug Schwartz – mastering ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format ! Catalog |- | Australia | 1997 | TWA | CD | TWAE022 |} ==References== == External links == * Film Songs at Discogs (list of releases) Category:1997 EPs Category:Stan Ridgway albums Category:Albums produced by Stan Ridgway
title: Film Songs
